issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.gotts.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gotts.com%2F) ### Comment > When Adguard is disabled, there is normally an option to scroll down and select “no thanks” in the newsletter popup. With Adguard enabled, the “no thanks” option is blocked and the popup is stuck there forever with no way to dismiss. The popup should either be blocked entirely or left in its original state. Username: `@contextnerror` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/kytcn69u8lc00wgsokwkssg408sws4kke6bn815m2o.jpg?nc=1)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://apps.apple.com/app/id1434426876](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapps.apple.com%2Fapp%2Fid1434426876) ### Comment > Зайти в приложение Моспаркинг. > Сразу увидеть надпись про VPN. > Выбрать парковку. > Увидеть, что кнопка оплаты недоступна.
